job_tasks.phrase: Continually experimenting with and integrating the latest generative AI tech to pioneer novel educational experiences
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to working with generative AI technologies to create new learning experiences, which falls under the 'Modeling' category focusing on generative techniques.

job_tasks.phrase: envision, code, and ship sophisticated full-stack applications
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the entire software development lifecycle, from conception to deployment of applications, aligning with 'Software Development'.

job_tasks.phrase: seamlessly weave AI magic across front-end interfaces, back-end algorithms, and end-to-end product experiences
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the integration of AI into various parts of a software system, including front-end and back-end development, fitting the 'Software Development' category.

job_tasks.phrase: Owning end-to-end product lifecycle, from gathering requirements to development, launch and iterative enhancement
job_tasks.justification: This involves understanding the product's journey from initial requirements to ongoing improvement, demonstrating a grasp of business objectives and product strategy.

job_tasks.phrase: Partnering with stakeholders to align development with learner needs and garner insights to fuel cycles of innovation
job_tasks.justification: This emphasizes collaboration with stakeholders to understand needs and translate them into technical solutions, a key aspect of 'Business Understanding'.

job_tasks.phrase: Leveraging AI-driven automation across testing, debugging and beyond to maximize development velocity and robustness
job_tasks.justification: This describes using automation for testing and debugging to improve the development process, which is related to operational efficiency in software development and AI systems.

job_tasks.phrase: Develop and deliver engaging, human-centered AI applications
job_tasks.justification: This is a direct statement about developing and delivering software applications with a focus on user experience and AI integration.

job_tasks.phrase: partnering closely with stakeholders to ensure we're nailing learner needs
job_tasks.justification: This emphasizes understanding and meeting the needs of the users (learners) by working with those who represent them (stakeholders), aligning with business understanding.

soft_skills.phrase: You'll wield autonomy and creative freedom to envision, code, and ship sophisticated full-stack applications
You'll own and optimize the entire product lifecycle
Partnering with stakeholders to align development with learner needs and garner insights to fuel cycles of innovation
you'll leverage AI-powered testing to maximize efficiency
Continually experimenting with and integrating the latest generative AI tech

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes building and deploying applications using generative AI technologies like LLMs. It specifically mentions integrating 'latest generative AI tech', 'full-stack applications', and 'end-to-end product experiences', which aligns with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer.
